Play.Header: DAL wins toss, elects to Receive, and IND elects to defend the South goal.
4-A.Vinatieri kicks 67 yards from IND 30 to DAL 3. 14-M.Austin pushed ob at DAL 34 for 31 yards (36-De.Reid). Return right side of the field.
Dallas Cowboys at 15:00, (1st play from scrimmage 14:53)
